title: Despite storm, NASA is pressing ahead with its Artemis launch plan
description: Nicole grow into a hurricane too quickly for the SLS rocket to be rolled back to its assembly building before the storm struck the Florida coast, NASA officials said, but said damage was minimal and they'd try to launch early Wednesday.

title: ‘Call of Duty: Warzone 2.0’ is nearly here. What happens to ‘Warzone?’
description: "Call of Duty: Warzone" won over millions since launching March 2020, but with the arrival of "Warzone 2.0," here are the changes coming to the original.

title: The evolution of Kratos
description: The creators of God of War discuss the themes that animate Kratos: brutality, fatherhood and redemption.

title: On Elon Musk’s Twitter, gaming offers a glimpse of a chaotic future
description: Drastic changes to Twitter are reverberating across the video game industry and its surrounding community.

title: Twitter users impersonate video game companies, causing mayhem
description: Using Twitter Blue's new checkmarks, several Twitter users have posed as video game companies to troll, make jokes and even broadcast a message to Elon Musk.

title: Twitter pauses paid sign-ups as fake accounts spread online
description: Twitter accounts impersonating politicians and celebrities took over the site.

title: We got Twitter ‘verified’ in minutes posing as a comedian and a senator
description: Twitter will now give a blue check mark to any account for $8, including our imposter Blaire Erskine and Sen. Ed Markey. That makes it mostly worthless.

title: From nuclear power to bamboo: The climate solutions at COP27
description: As leaders gather in Egypt for the United Nations climate summit, several climate change solutions are gaining traction.

title: Huge Australian health hack exposes abortion patients and others
description: Cybercriminals in Russia are believed responsible for releasing the patient information, including details on treatment for mental health and alcohol issues.
